description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

    Features

    TASKS-33721 Implement FilterCriteria writing to 2003 mpp format
    TASKS-33720 Implement GanttChart data writing to 2010-13 mpp formats
    TASKS-33705 Implement default ResourceToColumnTextConverter methods for all resource fields
    TASKS-33705 Implement default TaskToColumnTextConverter methods for all task fields
    TASKS-33693 Implement GanttChart data writing to 2007 mpp format
    TASKS-33693 Implement GanttChart data writing to 2003 mpp format
    TASKS-33661 Add Task.Progress rendering in GanttChart
    TASKS-33661 Add Task.Deadline rendering in GanttChart 
 
    Enhancements

    TASKS-33715 MPP->PDF: Retain same view for Resource Usage, Resource Sheet, Resource Form, Resource Graph, etc
    TASKS-33708 Text alignment and indentation problem in tasks list
    TASKS-33705 Render all the coumns as per source MPP while conversion to PDF
    TASKS-33679 Render whole project as single image without page break borders 

    Bug fixes

    TASKS-33732 Project to PDF: Resource names jumbles up
    TASKS-33729 MPP updated by Aspose.Tasks raises error message when modified in MSP
    TASKS-33727 Issue with dll obfuscations
    TASKS-33725 Exception raised while loading MPP file
    TASKS-33717 Exception raised while saving project data to MPP
    TASKS-33709 Inner bar for task is missing in GantChart view time line
    TASKS-33706 Resource label getting cut off in time line section
    TASKS-33704 Disable automatic task sorting while MPP to PDF conversion
    TASKS-33703 All the indicators are not displayed like Over allocated resource indicator
    TASKS-33681 SaveToSeparateFiles flag is not effective for MemoryStream
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
